title: 97/739/EC: Council Decision of 6 October 1997 concerning the conclusion of bilateral agreements between the Community and Cyprus on Cyprus's participation in Community programmes in the fields of education, training and youth
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 6 October 1997 concerning the conclusion of bilateral agreements between the Community and Cyprus on Cyprus's participation in Community programmes in the fields of education, training and youth (97/739/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
The three Agreements between the European Community and the Republic of Cyprus concerning the participation of the Republic of Cyprus in the Leonardo da Vinci, Youth for Europe and Socrates programmes, are hereby approved on behalf of the European Community.
The texts of the Agreements are attached to this Decision.
The Commission shall represent the Community in the Joint Committee provided for in Article 7 of the respective agreements.
The President of the Council shall, on behalf of the Community, give the notifications provided for in Article 14 of the agreements.
This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 6 October 1997.
For the Council
The President
J. POOS
